title: Create a new order from the order list and verify it appears in the list
description: Verifies a user can start from the dashboard, create a new order, save it, and then see it listed.

title: Complete new order form and save successfully
description: Verifies saving a fully completed order shows a visible success state on the UI.

title: After saving, verify the created order is visible in the order list
description: Verifies that after saving an order, the user can see the new order entry in the orders list.

title: Validate required client field when saving a new order
description: Verifies the form blocks saving and shows a required-field validation message when client is missing.

title: Filter orders by status from the order list
description: Verifies the status filter updates the visible list to show only matching orders.

steps.description: Select "Paid" from the status filter dropdown
Wait for the order list to update

title: Change status filter and verify results change accordingly
description: Verifies switching the status filter produces a different visible state than the previous filter.

Select "Paid" from the status filter dropdown

title: Access CRM dashboard and view sales performance charts

Click on the start date field
Type "2026-01-01" into the start date field
Click on the end date field
Type "2026-01-31" into the end date field

description: Verifies that selecting an end date earlier than the start date shows a visible validation error.

Click on the end date field
Type "2026-02-01" into the end date field

Type "2026-01-01" into the start date field

Verify text "No budgets found" is visible

steps.description: Type "!@#$%¨&*()_+" into the budgets search/filter field

title: Orçamentos page remains accessible from another authenticated section
